title: Gateway to a city [West Gate Bridge]
creator_credit: David Morgan, John Richardson and Kestrel Films (Australia)
brief_description: Melbourne’s West Gate Bridge is a gateway to the future - a future of unprecedented residential, commercial and industrial growth for Melbourne and its Western regions. This film of the opening ceremony gives a historical outlook to the development of the river, shipping and the effects on the growth of the city of Melbourne.
